-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


@package mod-n
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Integers under a modulus
module Numeric.Mod

-- | Type representing an equivalence class under the integers modulo n
data Mod (n :: Nat)
instance Data.Typeable.Internal.Typeable n => Data.Data.Data (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance Text.Printf.PrintfArg (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Arr.Ix (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.TypeLits.KnownNat n => GHC.Real.Real (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Classes.Ord (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.TypeLits.KnownNat n => GHC.Real.Integral (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Enum.Enum (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Classes.Eq (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Show.Show (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.Read.Read (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.TypeLits.KnownNat n => GHC.Enum.Bounded (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
instance GHC.TypeLits.KnownNat n => GHC.Num.Num (Numeric.Mod.Mod n)
